Emphasizing the lack of essential nutrients in one's diet.", 'Deprived of food - Highlighting the emotional and psychological impact of hunger.', 'Nutrient-deficient - Focusing on the specific lack of essential vitamins, minerals, or macronutrients.', 'Fasting (when unintended) -
